definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 26:19 base, pedestal—[[אָָדֶן]] Ex 38:7; pl. [[אֲדָנִים]] Ex 26:19 +; cstr. [[אַדְנֵי]] Ct So 5:15 +, etc.
pedestals of fine gold, on wh. pillars of marble were set Ct So 5:15.
pedestals of the earth on wh. its pillars were placed Job 38:6 (‖ corner-stone).

(metal) pedestals, bases, or sockets in wh. tenons of planks & pillars of tabernacle were set up; two for each plank & one for each pillar Ex 26:19, Ex 26:19, Ex 26:19 + 52 t. in Ex 26, Ex 27, Ex 35–Ex 40, Nu 3, Nu 4 (all P); cf. LXX Sm Co for [[אָרְכּוֹ]] Ez Eze 41:22, of altar.
